experience.title: experience
experience.description:
Frontend:
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript — I have experience in building websites and making them visually appealing.
- Responsive Design — I ensure websites adapt smoothly to all devices.
- Animations & Parallax Effects — I enhance projects with smooth animations and engaging parallax effects.
- UI/UX — I focus on color harmony, intuitive navigation, and clean text-image alignment.

Backend:
- MySQL — I'm learning to manage and store data with MySQL and backend.
- Server-side Development — Exploring the fundamentals to build full-stack applications.

Project Experience:
- Personal Portfolio — Built my own website, integrating features like full-height sections, a bouncing logo animation, and a parallax-effect footer.

Other Skills:
- SEO — Learning search engine optimization to improve website visibility on Google.
- Problem-Solving — Tackling coding challenges independently, with a strong passion for self-learning.

Despite my young age, I've made impressive strides in frontend development while diving into backend technologies. Each project sharpens my skills, pushing me closer to mastering full-stack development.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: My biggest skill is front end, I have 2 years of experience in front end and I will continue to collect additional information without stopping. And besides these, I understand logo maker ui ux designer and figma very well and I have many projects in them.
